Class DataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.DataSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Instance>, Copyable

    public class DataSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements Copyable, java.lang.Iterable<Instance>
    A data set is just a collection of instances

    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
